quote: That’s the only thing that was wrong with the travel ban. You had Delta with a massive problem with their computer system at the airports.
quotePlain: That’s the only thing that was wrong with the travel ban. You had Delta with a massive problem with their computer system at the airports.
name: Donald Trump

claims.title: airport delays caused by Delta outage not travel ban
claims.negative: airport delays were caused by travel ban not the Delta outage

claims.truth: The Delta outage happened two days later.
